channel.title: Morgan's Blog
channel.description: Engineering deep dives, architecture notes, and backend lessons.

item.title: 2017: When We Built the Future of Eyewear in Less Than a Second
item.description: A retrospective on building biometric scanning, real-time 3D mesh generation, and AR/VR eyewear fitting in 2017.

item.title: Quick feedback: ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE with nullable columns
item.description: How to use NULLS NOT DISTINCT to make ON CONFLICT and unique indexes behave as expected with nullable columns.

item.title: Antigravity vs Cursor vs Claude Code: The Battle for the Developer's Soul
item.description: A comparative analysis of developer AI agents through value, workflow impact, and infrastructure economics.

item.title: From Smart to Sport: Why I Traded My Apple Watch for the COROS APEX 4
item.description: A field review of endurance-watch tradeoffs for ultra trail training and race-day reliability.

item.title: The Force Multiplier: AI as the New Engineering Substrate
item.description: Why staff-level engineering shifts from raw implementation to orchestration when AI acceleration becomes ubiquitous.

item.title: Changing Hats: From Backend to Data Engineer at RockFi
item.description: Why I transitioned towards Data Engineering at RockFi, diving into Dagster, medallion architecture, and our future with modern data warehouses.

item.title: New Chapter: Joining RockFi as Staff Back-end Engineer
item.description: Career update and technical mission context for building a scalable wealth-management platform.

item.title: Rebuilding Cloud Experience: The Trade-Offs of Serverless at Scale
item.description: An incredibly deep dive into our journey transitioning from a self-hosted-only model to offering a Fully Hosted Cloud agent. We tackle Cold Starts, AWS Lambda Layers, VPC structuring, and why horizontal scaling is a database's worst enemy.

item.title: Escaping the Onboarding Matrix: Functional Factories to the Rescue
item.description: A look back at our onboarding at Forest Admin, where supporting true self-hosted architectures forced us to build hundreds of separate setup flows, and how we solved it using functional factories.

item.title: Idempotency and Debounce in BullMQ: hardening jobs with a jobify contract
item.description: How to implement idempotent, debounced queue execution semantics with deterministic identifiers in BullMQ.

item.title: Node.js Backpressure for Massive History Exports: Streams, Async Generators, and S3 Multipart
item.description: Production patterns for exporting massive historical datasets with bounded memory and resilient throughput.

item.title: Jobify over BullMQ: a production pattern for jobs, workers, and queues (with NestJS)
item.description: A production-ready queue orchestration pattern over BullMQ with stricter worker contracts and safer operations.

item.title: Breaking Through Firewalls: Why We Chose Server-Sent Events (SSE) for Agent Communication
item.description: The architectural choices, joys, and sheer traumas of maintaining thousands of open HTTP connections across corporate firewalls.

item.title: SCIM Provisioning: The Illusion of Standards and the Reality of RFC 7644
item.description: How we implemented SCIM for user provisioning across Okta, Azure AD, and Google, while discovering that standard RFCs are more like loose guidelines.

item.title: Post-Mortem: The Day Redis Reached its Limits
item.description: A weekend outage at Forest Admin caused by Redis memory exhaustion, highlighting the dangers of a single point of failure, data lifecycles, and scaling issues.

item.title: Scaling CI at Forest Admin: When Tests Take Longer Than Your Lunch Break
item.description: How we handled the explosion of CI times during our Series A scaling phase at Forest Admin, the nightmare of merging artifacts, and the endless pursuit of deterministic tests.

item.title: When PostgreSQL Is No Longer Enough: Migrating Activity Logs to Elasticsearch
item.description: How we navigated performance bottlenecks by migrating our massive activity logs system from PostgreSQL to Elasticsearch using a hybrid search architecture.

item.title: Security and authentication with identity federation (OpenID Connect)
item.description: A production breakdown of OIDC, OAuth2 bearer tokens, and SAML assertion flows when one platform is both service provider and identity provider.
